snippet: The chief prosecutor in Veracruz State resigned Friday, a day after 32 bodies were discovered in a residential neighborhood.
lead_paragraph: The chief prosecutor in Veracruz State resigned Friday, a day after 32 bodies were discovered in a residential neighborhood.

headline.main: Mexico: Prosecutor Quits After 32 Bodies Are Found
headline.print_headline: Mexico: Prosecutor Quits After 32 Bodies Are Found
